title: It's good to be "big" or "fed" or "fat" but bad to be "heavy."

replies.body:
Let's put it these terms:

Fed - The champion acquired the nutrients it needs to grow strong and powerful.

Heavy - The champion has done jack shit and is so lazy that you can't carry it.

a fed champion is one that has more items.
a heavy champion is one that isn't helping.

you can be fed, heavy, both, or neither at any given time.

I always assumed "heavy" was just another word for tanky bruiser.

And that seems just fine to be right now.
